websites.source_code:
n = int(raw_input())
a = map(int, raw_input().split())

l = a.pop(0)
c = l
a.sort()
while l <= max(a):
 if l <= a[-1]:
  a[-1] -= 1
  l += 1
  a.sort()

print l - c

websites.source_code:
n=input()
a=map(int,raw_input().split())

avg=a[0]
count =1
count1=0
for i in range(1,len(a)):
    if a[i]>a[0]:
        avg+=a[i]
        count+=1

    if a[i]==a[0]:
        count1+=1

if avg==a[0] and count1==len(a)-1:
    print 1
    exit(0)
        
if avg==a[0] and count==1:
    print 0
    exit(0)




#print avg
avg/=count

#print avg


    

    
if isinstance(avg,int):
    print avg+1-a[0]
    
else:
    print avg-a[0]
